title: GME 研究下D貨係邊個仆街陷家產借出黎俾人沽空

replies.msg:
長文 唔睇唔好留言問升定跌 睇完都唔好問

如果你想講140%係無借貨沽空既 你可以返出去先 我唔想再討論依個問題
如果你仲未知點解可以過100%既 你都可以返去睇下之前其他ching既解釋

好簡單就係個市場有好多player 至少幾百個 本來有10000個蘋果 分散係依堆player度
只要有第一個人借貨沽空第左1股 依10000(9999處女+1個唔係處)個蘋果就得返9999個係處女 無人分到邊個先係處女 因為交收果時無係額頭寫住"我係處女" 慢慢邊個先係處已經唔重要
而個%係每一間broker既淡倉report數 唔代表佢無相應既好倉係同一間broker 你亦都無得check因為淡倉report無breakdown per broker

一隻股票天生一定有100%好倉(long side) 0%淡倉
淡倉+1% = 好倉+1%
好倉 - 淡倉 永遠都係 = 100%, 你唸下如果 可以多／少過100 投票果時點撚算
所以一般借人貨沽空 同 借貨俾人係無投票權

我唔一定岩 純粹提供資料+可能性
我既基礎係
1. 只有Market Maker可以naked short
2. 所有沽空正股既都有借到貨
3. 佢地無做法例唔俾既野(e.g. naked short shares) 只係做好多法例無講俾唔俾既野 即係 無話唔得 = 得 既邏輯

咁多左果x%貨係邊個借
依度有份SEC 2014年既survey
A Pilot Survey of Agent Securities Lending Activity
https://www.sec.gov/files/Porter_PilotSurveyAgentSecuritiesLendingActivity.pdf
入面有講securities lending 係點運作
[img]https://na.cx/i/aHFN9UG.

png[/img]

簡單講
1. 任何人1股唔可以借2次俾人
2. 養老基金 共同基金 X基金 XX基金 XXX基金 Broker 保險公司 就係借貨出去既人
你會問 點解會有人將自己既貨借出去俾人沽空咁on9?
因為佢沽空既同時 亦都多左個buy side 理論上有1股睇淡 亦都多左1股睇好
而且仲有利息收
依d大基金係借貨唔貨投票權 即係佢地自己可以照有公司話事權

個問題出現
1. 貨主有無迫緊人還貨 (唔知)
2. 幾多現有股東既貨借左出去? (唔知 知既話理論上會計到每股走幾多轉先平到所有淡倉)
3. 邊度睇到每間 broker有幾多好倉淡倉 per 個股? 有無broker淡倉多過好倉?
4. 邊個先係沽空緊既人?

打住咁多先

無人睇
已完
繼續打pls

大把人仲係唔明點解好倉可以多過100%
同以為short多過100%死硬
你可以解釋多d先多人討論到
個個淨係等結論

假設而家GME 股票持倉比例係大股東80%，散戶20%

本身沽空比例仲淨返120%未平倉，係咪就算散戶SH,只要大股東肯借晒啲貨出去，沽空公司就可以平到倉

依d大基金係借貨唔貨投票權 即係佢地自己可以照有公司話事權


可以嘅咩？

replies.msg:
As an example, take a situation involving four investors. Annie owns shares of GameStop, and Annie and her broker have an agreement that allows the broker to lend Annie's shares to short-sellers. It lends them to Bob, who subsequently sells those borrowed shares short in hopes that GameStop's share price will fall.

An investor named Chris ends up buying those borrowed shares from Bob. However, Chris has no way of knowing that those shares have been borrowed from Annie. To Chris, they're just like any other shares.

More importantly, if Chris has the same kind of agreement, then Chris's broker can lend out those shares to yet another investor. Diane, another GameStop bear, can borrow those shares and sell them short.

In this example, the same shares end up getting borrowed and sold twice. The short interest volume these transactions add to the total is twice the number of shares actually involved. You can therefore see that if this happened throughout the market, total short interest would eventually exceed the number of shares outstanding and approach 200%.

FOR TLDR
一條友authorise 咗可以比broker 借出股票比人short sell, short seller short sell 完有人買, 以上重覆, 所以超過100%
Source https://www.fool.com/investing/2021/01/28/yes-a-stock-can-have-short-interest-over-100-heres/

大把人仲係唔明點解好倉可以多過100%
同以為short多過100%死硬
你可以解釋多d先多人討論到

As an example, take a situation involving four investors. Annie owns shares of GameStop, and Annie and her broker have an agreement that allows the broker to lend Annie's shares to short-sellers. It lends them to Bob, who subsequently sells those borrowed shares short in hopes that GameStop's share price will fall.

An investor named Chris ends up buying those borrowed shares from Bob. However, Chris has no way of knowing that those shares have been borrowed from Annie. To Chris, they're just like any other shares.

More importantly, if Chris has the same kind of agreement, then Chris's broker can lend out those shares to yet another investor. Diane, another GameStop bear, can borrow those shares and sell them short.

In this example, the same shares end up getting borrowed and sold twice. The short interest volume these transactions add to the total is twice the number of shares actually involved. You can therefore see that if this happened throughout the market, total short interest would eventually exceed the number of shares outstanding and approach 200%.

FOR TLDR
一條友authorise 咗可以比broker 借出股票比人short sell, short seller short sell 完有人買, 以上重覆, 所以超過100%
Source https://www.fool.com/investing/2021/01/28/yes-a-stock-can-have-short-interest-over-100-heres/
